oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names of people who speak |xam, including a 'half-caste' and various Boers, a German and a Frenchman. 1) The name of a Dutch man with whom ||kabbo (Jantje) was working, 2) This story is found in Book XI.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |xam-speaking people
